channel.title: CW being able to recharge Prince
channel.description: #### What happened? 2 CW recharged me as Prince when I executed the sheriff and I got 2 executions back #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Recharge was supposed to fail #### Steps to reproduce: Execute a BD Member as Prince and get a CW to recharge you #### Comments:

item.title: CW being able to recharge Prince
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Executions dropped to 0 from 3 I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: CW being able to recharge Prince
item.dc:creator: JanoRis
item.description:
did your executions jump from 2 or 3 to 0 after the execution of the obs?

It could be that there was an herbalist in play and defiled the body to look like an observer?

If not than this is a bug for sure

item.title: CW being able to recharge Prince
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
What happened?

2 CW recharged me as Prince when I executed the sheriff and I got 2 executions back

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Recharge was supposed to fail

Steps to reproduce:

Execute a BD Member as Prince and get a CW to recharge you

Comments:

Read full topic
